Compute: $1-2+3-4+5- \dots +99-100$.
inference:
We have the sum $1-2+3-4+5- \dots +99-100$.
We can group the terms:
$(1-2)+(3-4)+(5-6)+ \dots +(99-100)$.
Each pair of consecutive terms adds up to $-1$.
There are 50 pairs of terms.
So the sum is $50 \times (-1) = -50$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{-50}$. I hope it is correct.
